member.name: T:EduLocate.Core.EducationStages
member.summary: Represents which stages of education somewhere offers.
member.remarks: Can be used as a bit-mask as it is a flag.

member.name: F:EduLocate.Core.EducationStages.None
member.summary: No education stages provided. This usually indicates that this information is not available.

member.name: F:EduLocate.Core.EducationStages.Primary
member.summary: This establishment offers primary-school level education.

member.name: F:EduLocate.Core.EducationStages.Secondary
member.summary: This establishment offers secondary-school level education.

member.name: F:EduLocate.Core.EducationStages.College
member.summary: This establishment offers college level education.

member.name: T:EduLocate.Core.School
member.summary: Represents a school.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.Id
member.summary: The schools ID (sometimes referred to as the URN or Unique Reference Number).

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.IsOpen
member.summary: Whether the school is open.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.Name
member.summary: The schools name.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.Telephone
member.summary: The contact telephone number.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.EducationStages
member.summary: The stages of education offered.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.Gender
member.summary: The gender of the school.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.Religion
member.summary: The religion the school has specified.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.OfstedRating
member.summary: The schools last Ofsted rating. Null if no Ofsted data was found for the school.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.LastOfstedInspection
member.summary: The date of the schools last Ofsted rating. Does not have a time component. Is equal to default(DateTime) if no Ofsted data was found for the school.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.FacebookLink
member.summary: The facebook social link for the school. Null if one was not found from their website.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.TwitterLink
member.summary: The facebook twitter link for the school. Null if one was not found from their website.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.MoneySpentPerStudent
member.summary: How much money is spent on each pupil on average. Null if no spending data was found for the school.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.NumberOfPupils
member.summary: How many pupils are currently enrolled at the school. Null if no pupil data was found for the school.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.PercentGirls
member.summary: What percentage of pupils are female. Null if no pupil data was found for the school.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.Latitude
member.summary: The latitude of the school. Null if no position data was found for the school.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.Longitude
member.summary: The longitude of the school. Null if no position data was found for the school.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.Address
member.summary: The address of the school. Null if no location data was found for the school.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.Town
member.summary: The town of the school. Null if no location data was found for the school.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.Postcode
member.summary: The postcode of the school. Null if no location data was found for the school.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.OffersPrimaryEducation
member.summary: Whether this school offers primary-school level education.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.OffersSecondaryEducation
member.summary: Whether this school offers secondary-school level education.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.OffersCollegeEducation
member.summary: Whether this school offers college level education.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.IsReligious
member.summary: Whether this school identifies as religious.

member.name: P:EduLocate.Core.School.PercentBoys
member.summary: What percentage of pupils are male. Null if is null.

member.name: T:EduLocate.Core.SchoolGender
member.summary: Represents which genders a school is open to.
member.remarks: This is NOT a flag and as such should NOT be used as a bit-mask.

member.name: F:EduLocate.Core.SchoolGender.None
member.summary: No gender specified. This usually indicates that this information is not available.

member.name: F:EduLocate.Core.SchoolGender.BoysOnly
member.summary: This establishment is male only.

member.name: F:EduLocate.Core.SchoolGender.GirlsOnly
member.summary: This establishment is female only.

member.name: F:EduLocate.Core.SchoolGender.Mixed
member.summary: This establishment is open to both genders.
